title: Greek baklava
ingredients: ['Syrup', '475ml water', '400g caster sugar', '4 whole cloves', '1/2 cinnamon stick', '1 lemon, juiced, divided', 'Filling', '450g finely chopped walnuts', '200g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '170g unsalted butter, melted, or more as needed', '20 sheets filo pastry']
